serverInfo.name: Kroki
serverInfo.description: Render diagrams from text descriptions using Kroki. Supply PlantUML, Mermaid, Graphviz and more, and receive ready-to-use images. Ideal for documentation pipelines and visualizing architectures directly from source.

instructions: Invoke the Kroki tool to render the diagrams; do not output code or text in codeblocks, unless explicitly requested.
